tldr: All Unicode crates that are part of https://github.com/open-i18n/rust-unic are unmaintained.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using this package.
how_to_fix: Remove any `unic-bidi` package from your application. Please take a look at unicode-bidi as an alternative.
vulnerable_to: Use of Unmaintained Third Party Components
